Uses of Interface
org.gephi.graph.api.EdgeIterable

  • Packages that use EdgeIterable 
    Package Description
    org.gephi.graph.api
    General API that defines the graph structure.

    • Uses of EdgeIterable in org.gephi.graph.api

      Methods in org.gephi.graph.api that return EdgeIterable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EdgeIterable MixedGraph.getDirectedEdges()
      Returns an edge iterator of directed edges in the graph.
      EdgeIterable Graph.getEdges()
      Returns edges contained in the graph.
      EdgeIterable Graph.getEdges(Node node)
      Returns edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getEdgesAndMetaEdges()
      Return a unique EdgeIterable for edges and meta edges.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getEdgesAndMetaEdges(Node node)
      Returns edges and meta edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getEdgesTree()
      Similar as Graph.getEdges() but all nodes are visited in the hierarchy, so it returns edges for all possible nodes.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getHierarchyEdges() 
      EdgeIterable DirectedGraph.getInEdges(Node node)
      Returns incoming edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalDirectedGraph.getInEdgesAndMetaInEdges(Node node)
      Returns incoming edges and meta edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getInnerEdges(Node nodeGroup)
      Returns edges incident to nodeGroup and nodeGroup's descendants.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getMetaEdges()
      Returns meta edges for the whole graph.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getMetaEdges(Node nodeGroup)
      Returns meta edges for nodeGroup.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalDirectedGraph.getMetaInEdges(Node node)
      Returns incoming meta edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalDirectedGraph.getMetaOutEdges(Node node)
      Returns outgoing meta edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable DirectedGraph.getOutEdges(Node node)
      Returns outgoing edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalDirectedGraph.getOutEdgesAndMetaOutEdges(Node node)
      Returns outgoing edges and meta edges incident to node.
      EdgeIterable HierarchicalGraph.getOuterEdges(Node nodeGroup)
      Returns edges not incident to nodeGroup or nodeGroup's descendants.
      EdgeIterable MixedGraph.getUndirectedEdges()
      Returns an edge iterator of directed edges in the graph.
